page.description: Gets a list of sheets in an Excel document.

argument.name: FileName
argument.description: The Excel file to read. File must end in .xlsx extension.

description.p: Returns a cr-lf delimited list of sheets in the file.

page.example: dim Doc as Office::ExcelDocument ? doc.GetSheetNames("C:\Users\JaneDoe\Documents\excelDoc.xlsx") = Sheet1 Sheet2 Sheet3
